SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT p.post_no, p.post_type, u.user_id, p.post_name, p.post_content, p.post_image, p.reg_date, p.blind_code, p.view_count, p.comment_count, p.report_count, p.qna_reg_type, p.qna_code FROM post p, users u
p.user_id = u.user_id(+)
AND p.post_no like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.post_name like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.post_content '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY post_no desc) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

AND p.post_no like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.post_name like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.post_content like '%${searchKeyword}%'
) countTable
